title: Web-Based Automated Document Classification and Control System for Accreditation Project Milestones
description: An intelligent OCR-based system that automates the classification, organization, and management of accreditation documents, streamlining the entire documentation process for institutional compliance and quality assurance.

features.title: Intelligent OCR Document Processing
features.description: Advanced optical character recognition technology automatically extracts and digitizes text from scanned documents, PDFs, and images for efficient document processing.

features.title: Automated Document Classification
features.description: AI-powered classification system automatically categorizes accreditation documents based on content, type, and relevance to specific standards and criteria.

features.title: Repository Management
features.description: Centralized document repository with version control, access management, and advanced search capabilities for quick retrieval of accreditation files.

features.title: Compliance Tracking & Reporting
features.description: Real-time monitoring of accreditation requirements, automated compliance reports, and milestone tracking to ensure complete documentation coverage.
